channel.title: UX & UI on random user oriented graphic design
channel.description: Recent content in UX & UI on random user oriented graphic design

item.title: Para Dogs are Paradox
item.description: Project: Naming, Branding and UX & UI for Paradox brand | Client: rausr.com | Year: 2020 Description: Dogs meets the parachute and that’s a Paradox. Working, moulding, bending absurd word connections always create something interesting. Next step was a transformation of this connection to some brand contours.

item.title: Advertising systems eshop
item.description: Project: New ecommerce web design for presentation advertising systems | Client: Madness | Year: 2020 Description: Ecommerce UX & UI design for presentation advertising systems distributor. Designed was client’s, also admin’s interface. Special interface requests: client’s reviews, questions and answers, client’s orders (summary, status and history) and etc.

item.title: T3deco system microsite
item.description: Project: Wix single page microsite | Client: T3deco | Year: 2020 Description: Quick single page microsite which introduce main benefits of the modular interior system by T3deco company. Site is running on the Wix platform.

item.title: ANOMALIA studio
item.description: Project: ANOMALIA studio | Client: ANOMALIA | Year: 2019 Description: Brand name, Logotype, UX & UI design for the small graphic studio ANOMALIA. Sad thing about this is short project lifetime - nice quick start and even quicker end :D
